name: Legacy of Blue Knight: Curse of Ajamnh
name_original: Legacy of Blue Knight: Curse of Ajamnh
description:
The legend say that the ancient country of Ajamnh is linked to the "Underworld Kingdom" a fantasy land known by the tales of the Blue Knight, but maybe is more than just a legend.

Use arrow keys, space for jump, left control to attack, enter to pause.

  • Development: 15 weeks
  • Engine: Unity
  • Genre: Platformer
  • Theme: Adventure, Fantasy
  • Features: Pixelart, four levels and bosses
  • Gameplay: from 15 to 20 minutes
